document_data.name: Elasha Evanara
document_data.mainbody: '''Elasha Evanara''' was a [[gold elf]] [[cleric]] of [[Labelas Enoreth]], a member of [[House Evanara]] and a librarian in [[Evermeet]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Elasha took care of the extensive library of Queen [[Amlaruil Moonflower]].
document_data.Personality: Elasha loved knowledge and books and always possessed an aura of peace, wisdom, and reassurance. Elasha had a deep understanding and adoration for the [[Seldarine|elven gods]] and their teachings, acquired after hundreds of years of research and contemplation.
document_data.Relationship: Amlaruil counted Elasha as a true friend. Often, the queen asked for Elasha's wisdom and comfort while she grieved.
document_data.Possessions: The librarian was known to have a [[dagger]].
